author: Cameron McWhirter
title: Mississippi Gov. Bryant Orders More Than 100 Bridges Closed
text:
The state of Mississippiâ€™s bridges are in such bad shape that the governor has ordered at least 102 closed this week.
Mississippi Gov. Phil Bryant, a Republican, issued an emergency declaration, authorizing the Mississippi Department of Transportation workers to shut down the bridges, with the help of state troopers, if necessary. The department will begin notifying counties Thursday morning to shut down the bridges within 24 hours or the state will step in, according to officials.
